# tf.keras.datasets.fashion_mnist.load_data

Loads the Fashion-MNIST dataset.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.keras.datasets.fashion_mnist.load_data`
* `tf.compat.v2.keras.datasets.fashion_mnist.load_data`
* `tf.keras.datasets.fashion_mnist.load_data`

``` python
tf.keras.datasets.fashion_mnist.load_data()
```



Defined in [`python/keras/datasets/fashion_mnist.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/python/keras/datasets/fashion_mnist.py).

<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Returns:

Tuple of Numpy arrays: `(x_train, y_train), (x_test, y_test)`.
